description: The Samastipur District Transport Office (BR-33) serves as the primary transport authority for the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. This RTO is vital for managing the high volume of traffic in a region known as a major railway junction and a key agricultural hub in North Bihar. The office oversees vehicle registration, driving licenses, and road tax collection for its 20 administrative blocks, ensuring compliance with the Motor Vehicles Act.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
